articles.author: Issy Ronald, CNN
articles.title: Nadal, Djokovic and Murray slam Wimbledon decision to ban Russian and Belarusian athletes - CNN
articles.description: There is a growing rift between some of the world's leading tennis stars and past and present Ukrainian players over Wimbledon's decision to ban competitors from Russia and Belarus due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
